burnToken(uint256,address).details: burns tokens on harmony to be unlocked on ethereum

params.recipient: recipient of the unlock tokens on ethereum

mintToken(uint256,address,bytes32).details: mints tokens corresponding to the tokens locked in the ethereum chain

params.receiptId: transaction hash of the lock event on ethereum chain
params.recipient: recipient of the minted tokens (harmony address)
